LED lights may keep great white sharks away from surfers, new study reveals https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/led-lights-may-keep-great-white-sharks-away-from-surfers-new-study-reveals/KOXDJKTXMJAMZA6NUCAWQ2XGBQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/led-lights-may-keep-great-white-sharks-away-from-surfers-new-study-reveals/KOXDJKTXMJAMZA6NUCAWQ2XGBQ/ NZ’s 'Shark Man' supports the research but warns it's not foolproof. Photo / Clinton Duffy
